title: Other products made in furnace
text: The furnace can smelt stone bricks from stone and steel from iron (the steel needs to be researched).

title: Two sides of belts
text: The left and right side of the transport belt can be used independently for different resources. Inserter puts things on the distant part of the belt.

title: Rebuilding
text: Stone furnace can be rebuilt by steel furnace without the need to mine the first one first. The similar works for assembling machines, transport belts, inserters chests and similar. It can be used to change direction of transport belt.

title: Electric network info
text: Invoking "__CONTROL__open-gui__" on electric pole will open statistics of the electric network it is connected to.

title: Stack transfer
text: Invoking "__CONTROL__stack-transfer__" will move the whole item stack. Moreover, the transfer command is smart enough to figure out where to move the stack. For instance, performing a stack transfer on an __ITEM__iron-axe__ in the main inventory will have it placed into the tools slot.

title: Inventory transfer
text: Invoking "__CONTROL__inventory-transfer__" will move all the item stacks of given type between inventories. This can be used, for instance, to transfer all the transport belts from the __ENTITY__wooden-chest__ to the main inventory.

title: Fast Entity transfer
text: Invoking "__CONTROL__fast-entity-transfer__" allows you to peform a transfer with the selected entity without opening its gui. If the player's hand is empty the transfer happens from the entity into the player's inventory, and vice-versa when player's hand is full. This can be useful in the early stages of the game, in order to manage __ENTITY__stone-furnace__s, __ENTITY__burner-mining-drill__s, etc.

title: QuickBar access
text: Every quick bar slot has a shortcut to fetch the item into the cursor. If you already have another item from the quickbar in the cursor, it is returned to the slot it was taken from.

title: Clean cursor
text: Invoking "__CONTROL__clean-cursor__" will move the item stack from the cursor into your inventory/quickbar.

title: Bulding while running
text: The quickest way to build more stuff in a straight line, like transport belts, __ENTITY__pipe__ or inserters is to hold the "__CONTROL__build__" on the place you want them to be built and run in the desired direction.

title: Fast building of electric lines
text: The fast way to build electric line is to drag the build key while moving, the next pole will be built on the furthest possible place automatically.

title: Filters
text: Invoking "__CONTROL__set-filter__ on the quickbar slot lets you set what this slot is reserved for. No other item can be placed into this slot, and items of the selected type will always be priorly moved into this slot.

title: Usable items
text: Usable items are activated by pressing the quickbar key on the corresponding slot. The mouse cursor specifies the place to activate them (for capsules and grenades).

title: Copy build
text: Building with "__CONTROL__alternative-build__" will copy all the machine internal configuration from the machine of that same type built for the last time. This includes the connection to the circuit network.
